\/C:\/Users\/admin\/Desktop\/codepool\/_: The article shares how to optimize the size of scanned documents taking resolution, color depth and image compression into account.
这篇文章分享了如何优化扫描文档的尺寸，涉及分辨率、位深度、压缩等等。
The article shares how to optimize the size of scanned documents taking resolution, color depth and image compression into account.
Scanning documents into a digital form can help companies save physical space, improve data retrieval, reduce costs, improve collaboration, etc.
将文档扫描成数字化的电子文件可以帮助公司节省物理空间、降低成本、促进协作、优化数据检索等等。
Scanning documents into a digital form can help companies save physical space, improve data retrieval, reduce costs, improve collaboration, etc.
Sometimes, we may come across very large scanned document files or files scanned with a low visual quality.
有时，我们可能会遇到非常大的或者图像质量较低的扫描文件。
Sometimes, we may come across very large scanned document files or files scanned with a low visual quality.
In this article, we are going to talk about aspects related to the size optimization of scanned documents.
在本文中，我们将讨论如何优化扫描文档的尺寸。
In this article, we are going to talk about aspects related to the size optimization of scanned documents.
Samples using <g1>Dynamic Web TWAIN</g1>, a JavaScript library which enables documents scanning from browsers, are created for demonstration.
用<g1>Dynamic Web TWAIN</g1>编写了相关的示例，它是一个允许从浏览器扫描文档的JavaScript库。
Samples using <g1>Dynamic Web TWAIN</g1>, a JavaScript library which enables documents scanning from browsers, are created for demonstration.
Before we get started, let's learn about how image sizes are calculated.
在开始之前，让我们了解一下如何计算图像大小。
Before we get started, let's learn about how image sizes are calculated.
Basically, it is affected by the number of pixels and how many colors it can represent.
它受到像素数量和它能代表多少颜色影响。
Basically, it is affected by the number of pixels and how many colors it can represent.
DPI stands for dots per inch and is a measure of the resolution of a scanned document or photo.
DPI代表每英寸点数，是衡量扫描文档或照片分辨率的指标。
DPI stands for dots per inch and is a measure of the resolution of a scanned document or photo.
The higher the DPI, the higher the quality and resolution of your scan and the resulting image.
DPI越高，扫描和生成的图像的质量和分辨率就越高。
The higher the DPI, the higher the quality and resolution of your scan and the resulting image.
Generally, scanning a document at about 300 DPI produces an image with a reasonable size and good quality.
通常，以大约300DPI扫描文档会产生具有合理大小和良好质量的图像。
Generally, scanning a document at about 300 DPI produces an image with a reasonable size and good quality.

Bit depth, also known as color depth, is the number of bits used to indicate the color of a single pixel.
位深度，也称为颜色深度，是用于表示单个像素颜色的位数。
Bit depth, also known as color depth, is the number of bits used to indicate the color of a single pixel.
The bigger the bit depth, the more colors a pixel can represent.
位深度越大，像素可以表示的颜色就越多。
The bigger the bit depth, the more colors a pixel can represent.
Most document scanners provide the option to scan documents in different color modes: black & white, gray and color.
大多数文档扫描仪都提供了以不同颜色模式扫描文档的选项：黑白、灰色和彩色。
Most document scanners provide the option to scan documents in different color modes: black & white, gray and color.

我们可以用JPEG和PNG等不同的图像文件格式压缩图像数据。
We can compress the image data with different image file formats like JPEG and PNG.

We can draw some points from the table:
我们可以从表中总结出下面两点：
We can draw some points from the table:
BMP is a lossless format which does not compress the image.
BMP是一种无损格式，不压缩图像。
BMP is a lossless format which does not compress the image.
JPEG does not work well for black & white images but it has the best compression rate for gray and color images.
JPEG不能很好地处理黑白图像，但它对灰色和彩色图像的压缩率最好。
JPEG does not work well for black & white images but it has the best compression rate for gray and color images.
Most of the time, we need to scan documents in multiple pages.
大多数时候，我们需要扫描多页文档。
Most of the time, we need to scan documents in multiple pages.
We can use TIFF or PDF as the container to save the images in one file.
我们可以使用TIFF或PDF作为容器将图像保存在一个文件中。
We can use TIFF or PDF as the container to save the images in one file.
TIFF and PDF support many image formats and compression methods.
TIFF和PDF支持多种图像格式和压缩方法。
TIFF and PDF support many image formats and compression methods.
Since different compression methods work differently for different color modes, Dynamic Web TWAIN uses the following compression strategies to achieve an optimum result.
由于不同的压缩方法对不同的颜色模式的效果不同，Dynamic Web TWAIN使用以下压缩策略来获得最佳结果。
Since different compression methods work differently for different color modes, Dynamic Web TWAIN uses the following compression strategies to achieve an optimum result.
For TIFF, it uses the following strategy:
For TIFF, it uses the following strategy:
对于1位图像，使用TIFF_T6压缩算法。
对于其他图像，使用TIFF_LZW压缩算法。
For PDF, it uses the following strategy:
For PDF, it uses the following strategy:
For 1-bit images, if the PDF version is over 1.4, use JBIG2 encoding, otherwise, use FAX4 (CCITT Group 4 Fax).
对于1位图像，如果PDF版本超过1.4，使用JBIG2，否则使用FAX4（CCITT Group 4 Fax）。
For 1-bit images, if the PDF version is over 1.4, use JBIG2 encoding, otherwise, use FAX4 (CCITT Group 4 Fax).
For 8-bit images, if the image is grayscale, use JPEG encoding, otherwise, use LZW (Lempel-Ziv-Welch).
对于8位图像，如果图像为灰度，则使用JPEG，否则使用LZW（Lempel-Ziv-Welch）。
For 8-bit images, if the image is grayscale, use JPEG encoding, otherwise, use LZW (Lempel-Ziv-Welch).
For 24-bit and 32-bit images, use JPEG encoding.
For 24-bit and 32-bit images, use JPEG encoding.
